review: 'Drop the rock'That was the first thing I heard when I loaded into a game of Rust. When I turned around I saw a man aiming a water pipe shotgun to my head. He repeated himself, 'Drop the rock', this time strengthening the 'Rock'. I slowly went to my inventory and drop the rock. He then shot me in the foot leaving me to bleed out.
